title: Ep. 26 :: The EU's Quick Fix For PIIGS
itunes:title: The EU's Quick Fix For PIIGS
description: The Disciplined Investor's Andrew Horowitz talks about the EU's bailout, Goldman's perfect track record, and what stocks look attractive on the pullback. Patrick Schultz, Chairman of Karma Blackbox (a high-frequency trading firm), discusses what went wrong when the Dow collapsed 1,000 points.
